heroContent.heroSubtitle: I want to help shape the future of the web
heroContent.heroParagraph: Whether you're building plugins, extensions, or libraries,  your contributions can make open, sustainable monetization a reality.

blog.title: An Evolving Digital Future: The Rise of Digital Public Infrastructures across the Caribbean (and Other Countries)
paragraphs: Reflections on the Caribbean Digital Public Infrastructure Summit held in April at the UWI Regional Headquarters in Kingston.
The first Caribbean DPI Summit held in Jamaica, marked a pivotal moment in the region’s digital transformation journey. Known for its vibrant culture...
